attributes.action: Do not reintroduce imperial weights and measures.
attributes.additional_details: This is not productive to a population which in the majority has been bought up on a metric system. It will be confusing for people, could result in cost increases and is archaic. It is another example of a government that is out of touch with the British population.
attributes.background: Do not progress with reverting EU law on metric measurements to imperial measures.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617540
